# Suffocasuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Very rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Very-rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
Creatures wearing one of these *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuits]]* gain immunity to inhaled poisons and become immune to diseases of all kinds. These suits are made from [[Suffocatio|poisonpuff]] caps ([[Suffocatio|suffocatio]]).
